Rudolph's Shiny New Year

Ano: 1976

IMDb ID: tt0073640

Classificação: 6.6

Sinopse: Father Time sends Santa a message telling him that the baby new year, Happy, is missing. And without the baby new year, it'll remain the old year forever. But it's foggy and snowing, so Rudolph's the only reindeer for the job. Rudolph learns that Eon (ugly buzzard) is also searching for Happy, so that Eon's life will never end. With the help of 1 Million B.C. (Voice of Morey Amsterdam of The Dick Van Dyke Show) and Sir 1023, and 1776, Rudolph searches through the islands of the Archipelago of Last Year and races against Eon to ensure a Happy New Year.—Kathy Li
